name: The Pathtector
description:
Game made in 3 hours for the 🔺 Trijam #145: The 3 hour game jam

The theme is: Anti-[you choose]. I chosen anti-tree

You are the protector of the path, you have to protect from the evil trees all the citizens who pass through the path.

Controls:
  • Move: arrows or awsd
  • Attack: space or enter
  • Restart: click the restart button after losing

Font: https://jotson.itch.io/gravity-pixel-font
